channel.title: Clicking buttom help fast please = rep
channel.description:
Hello guys , i need help real fast as i have a server with about 20 people on and someone has found a major bug , i really need help to fix this , ill explain so when you vote , and then you type ::reward to recieve the reward and it come's up with a screen saying Cash or Misc and misc = random item , You can multi click them both so you can recieve them any ammount of time's , how can i fix this please
If someone can make a detialed tutorial on how to fix ill be so greatful and rep! :D

item.title: Clicking buttom help fast please = rep
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“maxw, post:1, topic:436688”]Hello guys , i need help real fast as i have a server with about 20 people on and someone has found a major bug , i really need help to fix this , ill explain so when you vote , and then you type ::reward to recieve the reward and it come’s up with a screen saying Cash or Misc and misc = random item , You can multi click them both so you can recieve them any ammount of time’s , how can i fix this please

If someone can make a detialed tutorial on how to fix ill be so greatful and rep! :D[/quote]
Add a public int called voteClickTimer, make it 0, on the button ID where it adds the items check if voteClickTimer is indeed 0; and if it is add 20 to it, then if it is > 0 make it remove all windows… Then just make it so voteClickTimer goes down

Read full topic
item.source: Clicking buttom help fast please = rep

item.title: Clicking buttom help fast please = rep
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

try explaining better.
What i can understand is that an interface pops up , and shows two options, cash and misc, and when you click cash or misc it doesnt close the interface?
